greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=1; for n > 1, a(n) = floor(a(n-1)/5) if this is not among 0,a(1),...,a(n-1); otherwise a(n) = 2*a(n-1).
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Rest@Nest[Append[#, If[FreeQ[#, r = Quotient[#[[-1]], 5]], r, 2 #[[-1]]]] &, {0, 1}, 53] (* _Ivan Neretin_, Jul 31 2016 *)
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
